Description:
Detects the usage of the "Squirrel.exe" to download arbitrary files. This binary is part of multiple Electron based software installations (Slack, Teams, Discord, etc.)


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Karneades / Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Arbitrary File Download Via Squirrel.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '% --download %' or command like '% --update %' or command like '% --updaterollback=%') and command like '%http%' and (process_path like '%\squirrel.exe' or process_path like '%\update.exe'))
